Description: Chemical name
CAS number, without dashes
Source of toxicity value (e.g., IRIS, ATSDR, etc.)
Type of toxicity value (e.g., RfD, MRL, etc.)
Value of toxicity value in mg/kg-d
Hyperlink to toxicity value source (accessed at time of data entry)
Date of toxicity value source
Reference for study from which point of departure (POD) is derived
Type of POD (e.g., NOAEL, BMDL, etc.)
Value of POD in mg/kg-d
Value of benchmark dose (central tendency) in mg/kg-d (if POD is BMDL)
Benchmark response level (e.g., 1SD, 10% extra risk (ER)) (if POD is BMDL)
Description of critical effect
Composite Uncertainty Factor
Uncertainty Factor for animal-to-human extrapolation (interspecies)
Uncertainty Factor for human variability (intraspecies)
Uncertainty Factor for subchronic-to-chronic extrapolation (duration)
Uncertainty Factor for LOAEL-to-NOAEL extrapolation
Uncertainty Factor for incomplete database
Uncertainty Factor for other issues
Species from which POD was derived
Strain from which POD was derived
Body weight of animals in study
Route of exposure
Target organ of toxicity
Category of effect in the target organ of toxicity
Sex of animals affected
Type of dose-response data (e.g., continous, dichotomous)
Details (if available) of effect
Number of control animals
Number of control animals affected (dichotomous endpoints)
Reported mean response in control animals (continuous endpoints)
Reported measure of variance in response in control animals (continuous endpoints)
Type of variance measure reported (e.g., SD, SE) (continuous endpoints)
